mapper.insert: insert into bookingDetail (num, bookingDate, bookingTime, headCount, name, phone, email, purpose, request, totalPrice, createdAt, bookingStatus, roomNum, userNum, roomOption) values (null, #{bookingDate}, #{bookingTime}, #{headCount}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{purpose}, #{request}, #{totalPrice}, now(), #{bookingStatus}, #{roomNum}, #{userNum}, #{roomOption})
mapper.select: select bd.num, bd.bookingDate, bd.bookingTime, bd.name ,bd.phone ,bd.email , bd.headcount, bd.purpose ,bd.request ,bd.totalPrice ,bd.createdAt ,bd.bookingStatus ,bd.cancelReason ,bd.cancelDate, bd.roomNum ,bd.userNum ,bd.roomOption , r.name as roomName, r.thumbnailImage, r.address, r.address2 , r.lat ,r.lng from bookingDetail bd inner join room r on bd.roomNum =r.num where userNum=#{userNum} and bookingStatus=#{bookingStatus} order by ${sort}

select bd.num, bd.bookingDate, bd.bookingTime, bd.name ,bd.phone ,bd.email , bd.headcount, bd.purpose ,bd.request ,bd.totalPrice ,bd.createdAt ,bd.bookingStatus ,bd.cancelReason ,bd.cancelDate, bd.roomNum ,bd.userNum ,bd.roomOption , r.name as roomName, r.thumbnailImage, r.address, r.address2 , r.lat ,r.lng from bookingDetail bd inner join room r on bd.roomNum =r.num where userNum=#{userNum}

select bd.num, bd.bookingDate, bd.bookingTime, bd.name ,bd.phone ,bd.email , bd.headcount, bd.purpose ,bd.request ,bd.totalPrice ,bd.createdAt ,bd.bookingStatus ,bd.cancelReason ,bd.cancelDate, bd.roomNum ,bd.userNum ,bd.roomOption , r.num as roomNum, r.name as roomName, r.thumbnailImage, r.address, r.address2 , r.lat ,r.lng from bookingDetail bd inner join room r on bd.roomNum =r.num where bd.num=${bookingDetailNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE bookingDetail set cancelReason='${cancelReason}', cancelDate=NOW(), bookingStatus=5 WHERE num=#{num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bookingDetail ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 1;
